title: Crusader Kings 2 - FitGirl
description:
Crusader Kings 2 (v2.4.1, Horse Lords + All other DLCs, MULTI5) [FitGirl Repack]


::Information::


Release Date: July 14, 2015
Genres/Tags: Strategy, Grand strategy, Top-down, Real-time
Developer: Paradox Development Studio
Publisher: Paradox Interactive
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Clausewitz Engine
Steam User Rating for DLC: 72% of user reviews are positive (based on 100 reviews)
Steam User Rating for Original game: 93% of user reviews are positive (based on 12,074 reviews)

Interface Language: English, German, Spanish, French, Russian (fan-made)
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (3DM)


::Repack Features::


Based on non-scene 3DM release (1,002,831,506 bytes)
Game updated to v2.4.1 (ZXPB)
All released DLCs included
Russian fan-made localization added (not complete beta)
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Optional bonus soundtrack - you can skip downloading & installing it, if you wish
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 956 to 593/749 MB)
Installation takes 4-8 minutes (depending on your system)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 1.5 GB (~2.2 GB during installation)
Repack by FitGirl
